description:
🐍🐍 Pycon Colombia 2023 in this edition brings guests from another dimension, This year, we will have the participation of Gabriella (Biella) Coleman, she is a full professor in the Department of Anthropology at Harvard University and is a faculty associate at the Berkman Center for Internet and Society. Her scholarship and teaching address questions of science and technology, focusing on the politics, cultures, and ethics of computer hacking. She is the author of two books on computer hackers and the founder and editorof Hack_Curio, a video portal into the cultures of hacking. In 2022,she hosted the BBC4 radio and podcast series, The Hackers. You can learn more about her work here: https://gabriellacoleman.org/

I recorded one video and did not like it (I don't like watching myself on video, I guess) but I will retry this week and send something along!
-Biella

Website: https://gabriellacoleman.org/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BiellaColeman 
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/gabriella-coleman-837a5110/ 

This is the beginning of great announcements, follow us on our social networks so you don't miss any updates.

title: Gabriela Coleman PyCon Colombia 2023
